text: Cardi B is no stranger to headlines. The Bronx bred rapper has been on the news ever since her debut single ‘ Bodak Yellow ’ set the music world on fire. The hit single was the first female - sung song to reach # 1 on the Hot 100 chart since 1998. ‘ Bodak Yellow ’ reigned at the charts for three weeks – the joint longest by any female in 2017. However, this time she created headlines for a whole new reason. Belcalis Marlenis Almanza, or Cardi B as she is popularly known, has given birth to a baby girl. She let the world know through Instagram, revealing the name of the girl, ‘ Kulture Kiari Cephus. ’ The caption was set against a nude floral picture of Cardi B. Is Cardi B Pregnant?
